title: Joining of Materials Other Than by Welding
content:
Joining of Materials Other Than by Welding

State Regulations
§ 255.271 - Scope
§ 255.273 - General
§ 255.279 - Copper pipe
§ 255.281 - Plastic pipe
§ 255.283 - Plastic pipe: qualifying joining procedures
§ 255.285 - Plastic pipe: qualifying persons to make joints
§ 255.287 - Plastic pipe: inspection of joints

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
